title: User Registration Success
description: Verify that a user can successfully register with valid email and password.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Input valid email and password.
Submit the registration form.
Verify response status is 200 and user is created.
Verify user data is persisted in the database.

title: User Registration Failure on Invalid Data
description: Verify that registration fails with invalid email format or weak password.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Input invalid email format and/or password.
Submit the registration form.
Verify response status is 400 with appropriate error message.

title: User Login Success
description: Verify that a user can login successfully with correct credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to login page.
Input valid registered email and correct password.
Submit login form.
Verify response status is 200 and session cookie is set.
Verify user is redirected to dashboard (PEV module).

title: User Login Failure on Incorrect Credentials
description: Verify that login fails with incorrect email or password.

steps.description: Navigate to login page.
Input incorrect email and/or password.
Submit login form.
Verify response status is 401 with appropriate error message.
Verify user remains on login page.

title: Password Recovery Flow
description: Verify that user can initiate password recovery and receive confirmation.

steps.description: Navigate to password recovery page.
Input registered email address.
Submit recovery request.
Verify confirmation message is displayed.

title: Change Password Success
description: Verify that authenticated user can change password successfully.

steps.description: Login with valid credentials.
Navigate to change password interface.
Input current password and new valid password.
Submit password change request.
Verify response status is 200 and password is updated.

title: Change Password Failure on Validation Errors
description: Verify password change fails with invalid new password or wrong current password.

steps.description: Login with valid credentials.
Navigate to change password interface.
Input incorrect current password or invalid new password.
Submit password change request.
Verify response status is 400 or 401 with proper error message.

title: Logout Success
description: Verify that logged-in user can logout successfully and session ends.

steps.description: Login with valid credentials.
Click logout button or invoke logout endpoint.
Verify response status is 200 and session cookie is cleared.
Verify user is redirected to login page.

title: Access Protected Resource Without Authentication
description: Verify that access to protected modules or APIs without session redirects to login or returns unauthorized.

steps.description: Attempt access to PEV dashboard or other module URL without login.
Verify response redirects to login page or returns 401 unauthorized.

title: CRUD Operations Audit Logging
description: Verify that all create, read, update, delete operations produce detailed audit entries in user_logs with correct user, timestamp and data.

steps.description: Login with valid user.
Create a new project in GRV module.
Verify creation entry is present in user_logs with relevant details.
Update the newly created project.
Verify update entry is logged correctly.
Delete the project.
Verify deletion entry is logged in user_logs.

title: Pagination and Filtering on Logs API
description: Verify that logs API returns paginated results and supports filters for entity_type, action, user_id, and company_id.

steps.description: Authenticate user with appropriate permissions.
Call logs API with default parameters.
Verify response returns logs with pagination info and HTTP 200.
Call logs API with filter parameters (e.g. entity_type=project).
Verify response only includes filtered logs.

title: Route Audit Enable and Disable Auto Logging
description: Verify that admins can enable or disable auto logging on specific entity types via route audit API.

steps.description: Login as admin user.
Access route audit API to enable auto logging for entity 'project'.
Verify response status 200 and logging is enabled.
Disable auto logging for entity 'project'.
Verify response status 200 and logging is disabled.

title: ModeFin Business Rules Validation
description: Verify ModeFin module enforces business rules including conditional percentage distributions and 60 month projections correctness.

steps.description: Login and navigate to ModeFin section of PEV module.
Enter financial distributions violating percentage constraints.
Verify form validation prevents submission with clear error messages.
Enter valid distributions and project for 60 months.
Verify financial projections are correctly calculated and displayed dynamically.

title: Meetings Module CRUD and Export
description: Verify meeting creation, agenda management, participant addition, minutes recording and PDF export.

steps.description: Login and go to Meetings module.
Create a meeting with agenda and participants.
Confirm meeting is saved and visible in list.
Update meeting notes and save.
Confirm updated notes are saved successfully.
Export meeting minutes to PDF.
Verify generated PDF is correctly formatted and downloadable.

title: My Work Module Task Management
description: Verify individual task creation, update, completion status and linkage to plans and OKRs.

steps.description: Login and access My Work module.
Create a new task linked to a plan and OKR.
Verify task appears in user task list with correct linkage.
Mark task as completed.
Verify status updates and relevant audit log entry is created.

title: Session Security and Cookie Management
description: Verify security of session management via cookies and correct enforcement using Flask-Login.

steps.description: Login to generate authenticated session cookie.
Attempt session hijacking by manipulating cookie.
Verify unauthorized access is denied and user redirected to login.
Logout and verify session cookie is invalidated.
Verify further access to protected resources requires re-authentication.

title: Admin Permissions Enforcement
description: Verify permission controls that only admin users can access administrative APIs like route audit and control logging.

steps.description: Login as non-admin (consultant or client).
Attempt access to route audit or logging control APIs.
Verify access is denied with HTTP 403 Forbidden.
Login as admin and access the same APIs.
Verify access is granted and functions perform as expected.

title: Interface Modal Behavior for CRUD Operations
description: Verify that all CRUD operations use modals for create, update and delete dialogs following UX guidelines, with smooth scroll and navigation behavior.

steps.description: Navigate to a CRUD list (e.g. projects in GRV).
Open create modal and fill in data.
Verify modal opens correctly and scroll behavior is smooth.
Close modal, open edit modal for an item.
Verify edit modal opens correctly with pre-filled data.
Open delete confirmation modal.
Verify modal shows correct confirmation.

title: Audit Logs Retrieval by Entity
description: Verify that API returns audit logs for a specific entity type and entity ID with appropriate error handling for invalid inputs.

steps.description: Authenticate and request logs for valid entity type and existing entity ID.
Verify response contains logs related to the entity with 200 status.
Request logs for valid entity type but non-existing entity ID.
Verify response is 404 Not Found.

title: Audit Statistics Retrieval
description: Verify that API returns log statistics filtered by company_id and date range, with correct pagination and error handling.

steps.description: Authenticate user with permissions.
Request logs statistics for a valid company and 30 day period.
Verify statistics are returned and formatted correctly with 200 status.
Request statistics with invalid parameters (e.g. negative days).
Verify proper error response (4xx or 500) with descriptive message.
